tests.name: Test 1
tests.setup: unzip -q tests/boxes.zip -d tests && unzip -q tests/ans.zip -d tests
tests.run: timeout 1 ./haar tests/simple10x10.img tests/boxes_simple.txt > output.txt && cmp output.txt tests/simple_boxes.ans

tests.name: Test 2
tests.run: timeout 1 ./haar tests/simple10x10.img tests/boxes_errors.txt > output.txt && cmp output.txt tests/simple_errors.ans

tests.name: Test 3
tests.run: timeout 1 ./haar tests/black.img tests/boxes-256x256-100.txt > output.txt && cmp output.txt tests/black-100.ans

tests.name: Test 4
tests.run: timeout 1 ./haar tests/black.img tests/boxes-256x256-32x32.txt > output.txt && cmp output.txt tests/black-32x32.ans
